body: EASEOUT was launched in February 2020 by Tim Robards in Montreal, Canada. I'm inspired by the latest design trends and web development technologies. My aim is to provide creative inspiration, useful tutorials, articles and resources on an (almost) daily basis! The website runs on [](https://netlify.com)Netlify and is built with Vue.js. **FAQS:** **Q:** Can I advertise?\ **A:** We're open to one or two ad spots for relevant products or services. Email me at hello@easeout.co **Q:** How can I keep up with everything? \ **A**: Signup for [the newsletter](https://emailoctopus.com/lists/2c78099d-83e4-11ea-a3d0-06b4694bee2a/forms/subscribe) & follow us on [twitter](https://twitter.com/easeoutco)! **Q:** How can I show some love? \ **A:** You could buymeacoffee â˜•ðŸ˜ƒ Your suggestions & feedback are welcome! I always aim to bring new features & improve your user experience. \- Tim
